queries.query:
from(bucket: "lunar-mission")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "eclss")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "radiation_svh")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "lunar-mission")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "eclss")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cabin_pressure_kpa")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

charts.name: Heatmap - Wheel Traction and Motor Corr

queries.query:
from(bucket: "lunar-mission")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mobility")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "_field", "host"])
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "_field", "host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

colors.name: Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?
Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?
Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?

queries.query:
battery = from(bucket: "lunar-mission")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mobility")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "battery_voltage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

critical = battery
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: 30.0 }))
  |> yield(name: "critical")
